title: Let's look at New Zealand
brief_description: The history, geography, customs and cities of New Zealand, and the economic and cultural development of its people. Includes houses and battlements of ancient warlike Maori tribes; cities of today; geological wonders including geysers and hot mud pools; agricultural wealth; leading national exports; and life of a typical Maori family.
